prices.usage_restriction: Use sparingly - expensive and has content restrictions

workflows.name: Professional Grade 1080p (5 seconds)
workflows.description: Single-step 1080p generation using Runway Gen4 Turbo
workflows.notes: Most popular tier - best value for 5 seconds

workflows.name: Professional Grade 1080p (10 seconds)
workflows.description: Single-step 1080p generation using Runway Gen4 Turbo

workflows.name: Premium Grade 4K (5 seconds)
workflows.description: Two-step pipeline: Generate 1080p with Runway, upscale to 4K

workflows.name: Premium Grade 4K (10 seconds)
workflows.description: Two-step pipeline: Generate 1080p with Runway, upscale to 4K
workflows.notes: RECOMMENDED - Best margins (114%) maintained for 10 seconds

provider_priority.note: Veo is EXCLUDED from standard video fallbacks - use cross-tier strategy instead

critical_findings: Veo has 8-second maximum - CANNOT be used for 10-second tier
Luma Ray 2 is premium model for Ultra 10-second (best quality)
Luma uses per-pixel pricing, NOT per-second
Runway Gen4 Turbo offers best cost/quality ratio
Ultra 10-second uses Luma Ray 2 at $1.54 for absolute best quality (95% margin)
Veo is EXCLUDED from standard video fallbacks - too expensive and unreliable
Cross-tier fallback strategy maintains profitability better than expensive providers

veo_specialized_usage.usage_guideline: USE SPARINGLY - expensive and has Google content restrictions
veo_specialized_usage.restrictions_note: Subject to Google's content policy - may reject certain prompts
veo_specialized_usage.fallback_strategy: Always have fallback to generate video without audio if Veo rejects
veo_specialized_usage.when_to_use: ONLY when user explicitly requests automatic dialog/speech generation
veo_specialized_usage.wrapper_strategy: Don't advertise Veo by name - offer as 'AI-Generated Dialog' feature
veo_specialized_usage.backend_note: We ARE using Veo on backend for dialog workflows, but minimizing usage due to cost and restrictions
veo_specialized_usage.excluded_from: Standard video generation fallback chains - too expensive and unreliable

cross_tier_fallback_strategy.philosophy: Better to upgrade/downgrade tiers than use expensive providers

professional_to_premium_upgrade.trigger: Both Runway and Luma unavailable for 1080p
professional_to_premium_upgrade.action: QUEUE request or REFUND credits (do NOT upgrade to 4K)
professional_to_premium_upgrade.margin_range: Maintain 100% by not using expensive providers
professional_to_premium_upgrade.user_experience: Queue with transparent communication OR full refund
professional_to_premium_upgrade.message_option_a: High demand - your video is queued and will process shortly
professional_to_premium_upgrade.reason: Upgrading to 4K costs $0.35-$0.49, leaving <20% margin - not sustainable

premium_to_professional_downgrade.trigger: Both Runway and Luma unavailable for 4K
premium_to_professional_downgrade.action: Generate Professional 1080p + refund difference, OR queue/refund if no 1080p available
premium_to_professional_downgrade.message: Generated Professional 1080p due to high demand. Credits refunded.
premium_to_professional_downgrade.alternative: If no 1080p providers available: Full refund or queue request

benefits: Always maintains profitability (queue or refund vs thin margins)
Professional tier: Queue/refund better than <20% margin upgrades
Premium tier: Refund maintains trust when downgrading
Ultra tier: Cross-tier to Premium works perfectly (high margins)

vertical_video.note: IDENTICAL COSTS to 16:9 landscape - all providers charge same for vertical

classic_format_video.note: SAME COST as 16:9 (fewer pixels but same provider pricing) - Perfect for retro/nostalgia content

cinema_format_video.note: PREMIUM PRICING - 33% more pixels than 16:9, targets filmmakers and premium content creators

multi_format_bundles.note: Generate once, export to all platforms with intelligent reframing

bundles.workflow: Generate primary (50cr) + Luma reframe (10cr) + Bundle discount (15cr off)
Generate primary (50cr) + Reframe to 2nd (10cr) + Reframe to 3rd (10cr) + Bundle discount (30cr off)

platform_presets.note: User-friendly presets that map to pricing keys

dialogue_generation.description: AI-generated dialogue with voice sync - uses Veo 3.1 primary, Sora 2 Pro for extended clips
dialogue_generation.strategy: Premium pricing for complex multi-step workflow (video + voice + sync)
dialogue_generation.note: All formats supported including Cinema 21:9 with intelligent reframing

routing_logic.description: Smart routing based on duration and content safety

rules.condition: duration <= 8 seconds AND content is safe
duration > 8 seconds OR content rejected by Veo
rules.note: Sora 2 Pro handles longer clips and rejected content

image_models.description: 11 image generation models with transparent pricing - users choose based on artistic style
image_models.strategy: NO AUTOMATIC FALLBACKS - refund on failure to maintain artistic integrity

failure_strategy.policy: NO AUTOMATIC FALLBACKS - REFUND ON FAILURE
failure_strategy.rationale: Each model has unique artistic capabilities - switching models changes the output style
on_failure: Return error to user with refund confirmation
Let user retry with same or different model
failure_strategy.exception: Rate limiting - may queue and retry SAME model only
never_do: Change artistic style without user consent

virtual_try_on.description: Google Vertex AI Virtual Try-On - Generate realistic images of people wearing products
virtual_try_on.official_pricing: $0.06 per image (verified from Google Cloud Pricing)
virtual_try_on.strategy: Affordable pricing for specialized AI workflow - targets fashion, film, marketing use cases

storage_policy.platform_wide: All uploads stored in S3 for 7 days maximum
storage_policy.user_action_required: Download or save to Dropbox/Google Drive for persistence
storage_policy.lifecycle_rule: S3 bucket lifecycle policy auto-deletes try-on/* after 7 days
storage_policy.expiration_warning: Displayed prominently in UI with countdown

user_experience.ui_location: Unified Chat Panel - 7th Mode (after Image, Video, Audio)
generation_flow: 9. User prompted to save to cloud storage

no_refund_scenarios: Successful generation (even if user dislikes result)

cost_structure.google_api_cost_official: $0.06 per image (verified from Google Cloud Pricing)

margin_analysis.profitability: PROFITABLE - 88-150% margins across all tiers, MUCH MORE AFFORDABLE FOR USERS!

failure_strategy.policy: REFUND ON FAILURE - No fallback providers
failure_strategy.rationale: Specialized API with unique capabilities - no equivalent fallback

notes.google_api_preview: API is in preview (virtual-try-on-preview-08-04) - may have availability limits
notes.storage_duration: 7 days (platform-wide policy for all generated content)
notes.cloud_storage_encouraged: Users strongly encouraged to save to Dropbox/Google Drive
notes.no_local_persistence: Platform does not store generated content beyond 7 days
notes.oauth_optional: Users can upload locally OR use cloud storage
notes.wrapper_strategy: NOT wrapped - Virtual Try-On advertised by name (unlike video/audio models)

imagen_vision_apis.description: Google Vertex AI Imagen Vision APIs - 4 specialized computer vision APIs for automation
imagen_vision_apis.strategy: Ultra-affordable automation APIs - use as optional enhancements with safety rejection handling

apis.name: Product Recontext
apis.safety_warning: Avoid weapons, political symbols, controversial items

safety_handling.policy: All APIs throw SAFETY_REJECTION on Google content policy violations
on_rejection: Return generic message: 'Enhancement unavailable for this content'
Never expose Google rejection to user
best_practices: Don't make core features depend on Google APIs

workflow_integration_opportunities.scene_builder: Auto-categorize via Q&A: day/night, indoor/outdoor (1 credit each)
workflow_integration_opportunities.prop_visualizer: Show props in different scenes (20 credits)

competitive_analysis.vs_runway_upscaling: Cheapest upscaling available ($0.003 vs Runway higher costs)
competitive_analysis.vs_custom_ai_models: No training/maintenance costs, instant API access
competitive_analysis.unique_value: Product Recontext - no direct competitor for prop visualization

notes.google_safety: Stricter than OpenAI, Runway, Luma - use as enhancements only
notes.product_recontext_unique: Only API that can place products in new scenes
notes.no_ui_integration_yet: Backend utilities only - workflows will integrate as needed

luma_3d_nerf.description: Luma NeRF API - Convert 2D images to photorealistic 3D models (GLB, OBJ, USDZ formats)
luma_3d_nerf.strategy: Break-even to low-margin premium feature - targets virtual production, game dev, AR creators
use_cases: Character 3D model export (for Unity, Unreal, Blender)

metadata.best_for: Professional game-ready character 3D models from 2D images
metadata.value_proposition: PROFESSIONAL PRICING - 100-500x cheaper than hiring 3D artists ($500-2000)
PREMIUM PRICING - 100x cheaper than traditional 3D scanning hardware ($1000+)

generation_process.step_1: Download images from user's cloud storage
generation_process.step_3: Poll status every 30 seconds (max 60 attempts = 30 minutes)
generation_process.step_7: Prompt user to save to cloud storage

usdz.name: Universal Scene Description (Apple)
usdz.use_case: iOS AR apps, Apple AR Quick Look, Vision Pro
usdz.pros: Optimized for AR, native iOS support

delivery_methods: Immediate download via presigned S3 URLs

user_experience.ui_location: Production Page → Character Bank → Character Card
flow: 2. Modal opens with cloud storage check
3. User selects output formats (GLB, OBJ, USDZ)
8. Progress polling every 5 seconds in UI

no_refund_scenarios: Successful generation (even if user dislikes quality)
User deletes S3 files before saving to cloud

storage_policy.platform_wide_rule: All generated assets stored in S3 for maximum 7 days

permanent_storage.ui_warning: ⚠️ Files expire in 7 days! Save to cloud storage now.

cloud_storage_tracking.saved_flags: Track which formats saved to cloud
cloud_storage_tracking.user_confidence: User can verify files saved successfully

dynamodb_schema.ttl: 30 days (job records kept longer than S3 files)
attributes: inputImages: Array of source image URLs
s3Keys: Object with format-specific S3 keys
s3ExpiresAt: ISO timestamp (7 days from completion)
cloudFileIds: Object with cloud provider file IDs

vs_traditional_3d_scanning.wryda: Generate from existing photos - no hardware needed

vs_photogrammetry_software.traditional: Requires 50-200 photos, manual processing, expensive software

vs_other_nerf_services.advantage: Seamless integration with existing character/location banks

business_model.pricing_philosophy: Professional pricing - highly profitable while remaining 100-500x cheaper than alternatives

character_pricing.rationale: Professional positioning - still 100-500x cheaper than hiring ($500-2000), attracts serious game developers

location_pricing.rationale: Premium pricing for complex environments - 100x cheaper than 3D scanning hardware ($1000+)

revenue_strategy: Professional pricing builds credibility ($5 vs $1 looks more serious)
Still massively cheaper than all alternatives
Future add-ons: texture packs, rigging, animation-ready models

target_lifetime_value.game_developer: 50-200 character exports + 20-50 location exports = $350-1,500 LTV (5x increase)
target_lifetime_value.virtual_production: 10-30 character exports + 5-15 location exports = $100-300 per project (5x increase)

location_export.positioning: PREMIUM - extremely profitable while maintaining value

blended_margin.profitability: HIGHLY PROFITABLE - sustainable margins for growth

failure_strategy.policy: REFUND ON FAILURE - No fallback providers
failure_strategy.rationale: Luma is the only production-quality NeRF API available
on_failure: Log failure with detailed error info
Offer to contact support for complex issues

backend.service: Complete - Luma3DService.ts (NeRF API integration, polling, S3 upload)
backend.routes: Complete - luma-3d.ts (5 endpoints: character, location, job status, save to cloud, cancel)

frontend.modal: Complete - Export3DModal.js (cloud storage integration, expiration warnings)

integration_status.launch_ready: 85% - needs button integration + DynamoDB table creation + deployment

marketing_messaging.headline: Turn Your Characters Into 3D Models
marketing_messaging.subheadline: Generate photorealistic 3D assets from photos. No scanning hardware required.
social_proof_angles: Enabling the next generation of creators

notes.generation_time: 30-60 minutes typical, can vary based on image complexity
notes.recommended_workflow: Use character bank images for consistent results
notes.cloud_storage_mandatory: Platform-wide policy - enforced by UI flow
notes.no_local_storage: All generated files expire after 7 days
notes.strategic_pricing: Break-even on characters to acquire customers, profit on locations
notes.future_revenue: Add-ons (rigging, animation, textures) can increase margins
